#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int dp[5000005][2][2], a[5000005], b[5000005], c[5000005];

int main()
{
    int n;

    while(scanf("%d", &n) != EOF) {
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            scanf("%d %d %d",&a[i],&b[i],&c[i]);
        }

        dp[n-1][0][0] = 0;
        dp[n-1][1][1] = b[n-1];
        dp[n-1][0][1] = a[n-1];
        dp[n-1][1][0] = 0;

        for(int i = n-2; i >= 0; i--) {
            dp[i][1][1]  =max(b[i]+dp[i+1][1][0],c[i]+dp[i+1][1][1]);
			dp[i][1][0] =max(dp[i+1][0][1],dp[i+1][0][0]);
			dp[i][0][1] =max(a[i]+dp[i+1][1][0],b[i]+dp[i+1][1][1]);
			dp[i][0][0]=max(dp[i+1][0][1],dp[i+1][0][0]);
        }

        printf("%d\n",max(dp[0][0][1],dp[0][0][0]));
    }
}
